com.i2group.apollo.indexadminservice
Interface IIndexAdminService

public interface IIndexAdminService

A pair of methods for taking and releasing a snapshot of the search index in order to enable index backups.

Since:
3.0

Method Summary
 void releaseSnapshot(String snapshotToken)
          Releases a previously taken snapshot of the search index.
 IndexSnapshotInfo takeSnapshot()
          Takes a snapshot of the search index, returning an IndexSnapshotInfo containing the paths of all the files that must be backed up.
 

Method Detail

takeSnapshot

IndexSnapshotInfo takeSnapshot()
Takes a snapshot of the search index, returning an IndexSnapshotInfo containing the paths of all the files that must be backed up. The identified files are stable until the snapshot is released.

A call to this method should be followed by a call to releaseSnapshot(String) as soon as possible after the backup is complete.

Returns:
See above.

releaseSnapshot

void releaseSnapshot(String snapshotToken)
Releases a previously taken snapshot of the search index. This method should be called as soon as possible after a backup is complete.

Parameters:
snapshotToken - The String token that identifies the snapshot, as contained in the IndexSnapshotInfo returned by takeSnapshot().
